description.english: Won twice playing as the USA!
description.italian: Due vittorie con gli Stati Uniti!
description.spanish: ¡Has ganado dos veces con los EE. UU.!
description.turkish: ABD olarak oynarken iki kez kazandı!

description.english: USA: Occupied all of South America!
description.french: États-Unis: Amérique du Sud entièrement occupée !
description.italian: Stati Uniti: Occupato tutto il Sudamerica!
description.spanish: ¡Has ocupado toda Sudamérica con los EE. UU.!
description.turkish: ABD: Güney Amerika'nın tümünü işgal etti!
description.schinese: 美国: 已占领南美洲！
description.tchinese: 美國: 已佔領南美洲！

description.turkish: Avrupa olarak oynarken iki kez kazandı!

description.english: Western Europe: Occupied all of Africa!

description.tchinese: 歐洲: 已佔領整個非洲！

description.english: Won twice playing as North Korea!
description.italian: Due vittorie con Corea del Nord!
description.turkish: K. Kore olarak iki kez kazandı!

description.english: North Korea: Occupied all of Oceania!

description.italian: Corea del Nord: Occupata tutta l'Oceania!

description.turkish: Kuzey Kore: Okyanusya'nın tümü işgal edildi!
description.schinese: 北朝鲜: 已占领整个大洋洲！
description.tchinese: 北朝鮮: 已佔領整個大洋洲！

description.french: Gagnez deux fois avec la Russie !

description.russian: Две победы за Индию и Пакистан!

description.spanish: ¡Gana dos veces con India y Pakistán!
description.turkish: Hindistan ve Pakistan olarak iki kez kazandı!
